timeline.bodyText: So it seems like if they don't declare anything in config then the power opt check is enabled by default. Do we want that? Or should it be disabled by default?
timeline.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText: yes, given we removed UsageStats.isAppInactive check , which could be the main reason for false positives.  I think we would be safer not to enable this by default to continue and and have the power opt check like before as default, we can also have some data from Teams to make a decision about the default.
replies.author: kreedula

replies.bodyText: @kreedula So you are going to update the code? It seems enabled by default at the moment
replies.author: shahzaibj
